import '../styles/Favoris.css' import { useState } from 'react' function Favoris(){ const author = 8 const [favoris, updateFavoris] = useState(0) const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) return isOpen ? (

Articles favoris

post : {author}

Total : {author * favoris}

) } export default Favoris
